original: 3.3.4. Paccuppannātītavāra🔽Yo cakkhāyatanaṁ parijānāti so sotāyatanaṁ parijānitthāti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu āyatanam parijānāti saḥ sotāyatanam parijānittha ati no
translated: … The section on the present and past🔽Has anyone who fully understands the eye-sphere also fully understood the ear-sphere? No.

original: Yo vā pana sotāyatanaṁ parijānittha so cakkhāyatanaṁ parijānātīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana sota āyatanam parijānittha so cakkhu āyatanam parijānāti iti no
translated: Or has anyone who has fully understood the ear-sphere also fully understood the eye-sphere? No.

original: Yo cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānāti so sotāyatanaṁ na parijānitthāti?🔽Arahā cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānāti, no ca sotāyatanaṁ na parijānittha. Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu āyatanam na parijānāti saḥ sotāyatanam na parijānittha ati  arahā cakkhāyatanam na parijānāti no ca sotāyatanam na parijānittha agga magga samaṅgin ca
translated: Has anyone who has not fully understood the eye-sphere not fully understood the ear-sphere?🔽A perfected one has not fully understood the eye-sphere, but has not fully understood the ear-sphere.

original: arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā cakkhāyatanañca na parijānanti sotāyatanañca na parijānittha.
analyzed: arahantam ca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā cakkhāyatanañca na parijānanti sotāyatanañca na parijānittha
translated: Except for the one on the path to the foremost state and the perfected one, the rest have not fully understood the eye-sphere and have not fully understood the ear-sphere.

original: Yo vā pana sotāyatanaṁ na parijānittha so cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānātīti?🔽Aggamaggasamaṅgī sotāyatanaṁ na parijānittha, no ca cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānāti.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana sota āyatanam na parijānittha so cakkhu āyatanam na parijānāti iti  agga magga samaṅgī sota āyatanam na parijānittha no ca cakkhu āyatanam na parijānāti
translated: Or has anyone who has not fully understood the ear-sphere not fully understood the eye-sphere?🔽The one on the path to the foremost state has not fully understood the ear-sphere, but has not fully understood the eye-sphere.

original: Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā sotāyatanañca na parijānittha
analyzed: agga magga samaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā sotāyatanañca na parijānittha
translated: Except for the one on the path to the foremost state and the perfected one, the rest have not fully understood the ear-sphere and have not fully understood the eye-sphere.
and they do not fully understand the eye faculty.
